ARABIC: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except those who have iman and do right actions: they will have a wage which never fails,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Except those who believe and do the right: For them there is reward unending.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: except for those who believe and do good deeds. Theirs shall be an unending reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except the righteously striving believers, who will receive a never-ending reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except those who believed and did good deeds – for them is a reward that will never end.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except those who believe and do good; for them is a reward that shall never be cut off.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: except those that believe, and do righteous deeds -- theirs shall be a wage unfailing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Save those who believe and do good works, for theirs is a reward unfailing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But for those who believe and do good works; for them there shall be a never-ending reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: But those who believe and work righteous works, theirs shall be a hire unending.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: excepting such as are faithful and do righteous deeds: for them there will be an everlasting reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Except to those who believe and work righteous deeds: For them is a Reward that will never fail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Save those who believe and do righteous good deeds, for them is a reward that will never come to an end (i.e. Paradise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except to those who believe, and do righteous deeds, for theirs is an unfailing recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except those who believe and do good deeds; they will have an undiminished reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [84:25] except those who believe and perform righteous deeds: theirs will be an unfailing reward, one that is unending, undiminished and not given to them in expectance of anything in return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then exempted from these the believers, saying: (Save those who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an (and do good works) and do acts of obedience privately between themselves and their Lord, (for theirs is a reward) in Paradise (unfailing) undiminished and unblemished; it is also said this means: they will not be constantly reminded about the blessings bestowed upon them; and it is also said this means: their good deeds will not be decreased after they reach old age or after they die'. And of the surah in which Mansions of the Stars are mentioned, which is all Meccan and consists of 22 verses, 109 words and 438 letters: Surah 85: Mansions of the Stars (al-Buruj,) And of the surah in which Mansions of the Stars are mentioned, which is all Meccan and consists of 22 verses, 109 words and 438 letters:
